column1: The Pit Room////Long line on a Friday night but it went really fast! Im very picky about my potato salad and their Mustard potato salad passed the test! I like a more mustard- based potato salad for sure
column2: like their's! The jalapeno cheese pork sausage sandwich was amazing. Cole slaw was very vinegar-y
column3: just like I like! Great atmosphere
column5: and the Astros game on. Couldn't get better!!
